bodydiv.p: The Board is supported by a network of national accounting standard-setting bodies and regional bodies. In addition to performing functions within their mandates, such bodies can undertake research, provide guidance on the Board’s priorities, facilitate or co-operate on outreach, encourage stakeholder input from their own jurisdictions into the Board’s due process and identify emerging issues.
